snippet: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon avoided any mention of who brought the disease to Haiti, and critics said his mea culpa came too late....
lead_paragraph: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon avoided any mention of who brought the disease to Haiti, and critics said his mea culpa came too late.

headline.main: U.N. Apologizes for Role in Haiti’s 2010 Cholera Outbreak
headline.print_headline: U.N. Issues an Apology for Its Role in Haiti’s 2010 Cholera Outbreak
